summary: DURING HEAVY ACCELERATION A HEAVY EXHAUST SMELL TAKES OVER THE CABIN OF THE VEHICLE.  I HAVE TAKEN MY VEHICLE TO THE LOCAL FORD COMPANY 3 TIMES TO REPAIR THIS ISSUE, AND IT STILL HAS NOT BEEN RESOLVED.  MY VEHICLE WAS PURCHASED BRAND NEW--NO PREVIOUS OWNERS.  AS I DRIVE AND ACCELERATE NOW, I HAVE TO LET DOWN THE WINDOWS OF THE VEHICLE TO GET FRESH AIR IN THE VECHILE, AS I AM WORRIED CARBON MONOXIDE MAY BE LEAKING IN WITH THE EXHAUST SMELL.
